ComicInfo.Title: Untitled
ComicInfo.Summary: Untitled: Bloodstrike is tasked with bringing in the dangerous criminals that were freed when he shut down security at Hyde Penitentiary to free War Wolf. Cabbot takes a little detour first to confront Gunther and ends up being reunited with some old friends. Athena and Bailout take on three of the Horde on their own. When Marionette gets the best of them, the original Bloodstrike team shows up to rescue them.
